column4: Has anyone been able to install lucid lynx by mounting the .iso through Grub2 ? I can boot the .iso but I can't modify the partition table since the image file is on the same disk. Any workarounds?
do you have a thumbdrive handy?
No... that would work, yes, I don't even have a secondary HDD
while I haven't tried to boot an ISO from grub (I wasn't aware you even could), if you did, you might be able to modify the partition table that way.
